title: Bug 134660[RCP]Layout got tricky view when refreshing
description: Bug 134660[RCP]Layout got tricky view when refreshing
SR: Steps to reproduce:1.New a library, add a label and a text2.New a report, extend lib.label and lib.text3.Modify the content of label in library4.Refresh the reportActual result:Only a label in the layout view but outline view is ok.Switch to XML Source, the code is library file(see the screenshot)
